name: Tata Consultancy Services
bossPosition: Regional Head, Banking and Financial Services, Europe
goal: Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) is a global leader in IT services, digital and business solutions that partners with its clients to simplify, strengthen and transform their businesses. We ensure the highest levels of certainty and satisfaction through a deep-set commitment to our clients, comprehensive industry expertise and a global network of innovation and delivery centers.
interests: Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Research and Technology, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives:
TCS engages with the European Union institutions in the following policy areas:

• Digital Single Market: Digital Single Market Package COM(2015)

• Data Protection: Proposal for a General Data Protection Regulation COM(2012) 11 final

• Cyber security: Proposal for a Directive on Network and Information Security COM(2013) 48 final

• Cloud: European Cloud Computing Strategy COM(2012) 529 final

• Big data: Communication on data driven economy COM(2014) 442 final

• Internet of Things

• eSkills

• Mobility: Directive 2014/66/EU on Intra-corporate transfers
